data.title: Voting Intention Data
data.meta_description: Find out voting intention and tactical voting information for Derby North | ThisVoteCounts is your go-to resource for the next general election. Understand the voting process, stay up-to-date on the voting process, and find out the tactical vote in your constituency. With our user-friendly platform, be empowered to make informed decisions and make your voice heard in shaping the future - because This Vote Counts.
data.text:
This affects the likely voting intentions in your constituency. For example, a former safe seat now may be a close race. Similarly, the top two competing parties may have changed.

The new 2024 'Derby North' constituency is formed of the following old constituencies:
